alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Kossuth; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 7:12PM CDT until July 05 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Worth County in north central Iowa... Northeastern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Northern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elmore to 8 miles east of Forest City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Lake Mills, Emmons, Rice Lake, Eagle Lake, Buffalo Center, Thompson, Titonka, Leland, Crystal Lake, Woden, Rake, Scarville, Miller, Hayfield, Pilot Knob State Park, Lake Mills Municipal Airport, Forest City Municipal Airport, Hogsback Wildlife Area and Eagle Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
